tutorial.name: Welcome to Kaetram
tutorial.description: Teaching you the very basics of Kaetram.

text: Hello there, I am the programmer of this world.
You'll first need to complete this tutorial
Do not worry, I coded it to be pretty short.
completedText: Why don't you just walk through that door over there eh?

text: Let me tell you a bit about these lands.
And when you're not killing stuff...
So for now, go kill 5 of them rats.

popup.title: Item acquired!

text: I am a spooky mage in this cave!
Here, take this bow and kill 4 of those rats!
completedText: Well then, hurry up and kill those rats.
Then you can get out of here!
